Reviews.Title: Neighbor (kid) thinks they're real
Reviews.Author: Ellen Broomfield
Reviews.Content: I have a neighbor across the street that was arrested for breaking into cars, etc. I bought these after he and his friends were shooting fireworks into my yard this 4th of July. He asked me a few days after I put them up if they could see what's going on across the street. I have them installed under the eaves of my garage and front door. I said yes and he was concerned that the police would ask for footage! I assured him that I won't provide the footage unless they ask for it. He's been a "good boy" since!

Reviews.Title: Nice design, but cheaply made.
Reviews.Author: Pat Etzwiler
Reviews.Content: Not to happy with the quality. Cheaply made with thin easily broken plastic. Motion sensor quit working within a few days. But, for the price...you get what you pay for. Seem to be doing what I wanted them to do. We have 6 "live" cameras on the property and added these two "fakes" to cover another area too far away from the wireless network. Seem to be doing their job of making people aware they are being watched.

Reviews.Title: its no dummy
Reviews.Author: cb
Reviews.Content: does what it says looks like a camera, lights up like a camera but not the price of a camera.and only a fool would stick around to see if it works. get one you will not be disapointed.

Reviews.Title: it is as was described
Reviews.Author: fred ballard
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real thing. glad it included the stickers that warn someone that they are being watched - a must!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for fooling people
Reviews.Author: Jason Quarles
Reviews.Content: We had a problem with a neighbor's kid stealing the battery out of our RV, although I couldn't prove it. These with the addition of the stickers placed on our battery box solved that problem. My only gripe would be the LED that flashes. The batteries don't last more than a few weeks and to replace them you must first climb the ladder, then hang upside down and try to remove a tiny screw without dropping it. Not worth the effort, so ours no longer blink but they still seem to be fooling people.

Reviews.Title: Good investment
Reviews.Author: Visa "catman43"
Reviews.Content: These fake cameras look real and do the job,nobody can tell that they are not real since they are installed at the top corners of my house. Every time I come home at night they start blinking the red light as a warning,you would have to be blind as stevie wonder to not see that.

Reviews.Title: Very reallastic
Reviews.Author: LegacyMaster
Reviews.Content: These look just like the real ones, my neighbors all have noticed and ask who installed my security system because they are interested in getting one. I really like the motion sensor and flashing red light feature. Awesome product!

Reviews.Title: very convincing
Reviews.Author: babalu
Reviews.Content: This is a sure deterent. The question you ask yourself is, Is it real, do I take that chance. Neighbors on both sides of me had their cars messed with.  My car was not even considered as far as I can deduct. Thanks for the realistic  affordable product.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fake Dummy IR Camera easy to install with mounting bracket & screws
Increase your security at a fraction of the cost of real cameras. Mix dummy & real cameras to increase your security value
Built-in light sensor will turn on flash light at night automatically. A power switch can shut off flash light when you need
Staff & thieves will never know it is a dummy. The inexpensive solution for security/theft problems with high imitation
The camera requires 2 of 1.5V AAA batteries (Not Included)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 Pack Dummy Security Cameras Bullet Fake IR Infrared LEDs Flashing Light Home Surveillance with Free Warning Decals 1RH
